title: ‘Will return to Red Fort next year’: In Independence Day speech, PM Modi makes strong pitch for third term
selftext: History has repeatedly shown ‘pride hath a fall’…in spite of that, political leaders won’t learn ever.
comments: Yes. It is a popular tourist destination. Anyone can visit it at almost anytime.
